abstract: Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa was fined for comments critical of an umpire on Sunday.
snippet: Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa was fined for comments critical of an umpire on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: ST. LOUIS - Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa, who was fined an undisclosed amount by Major League Baseball for criticizing an umpire during a live interview on national television, offered some words of contrition before Game 3 of the team's National League division series Tuesday.

headline.main: La Russa Is Fined for Criticism of Umpire
